episodes.title: Ready To Be Sober Or Not Ready To Be Sober? How Do You Know When It's Time To Quit Drinking?
episodes.description: When should you know it is time to quit drinking? This was how I knew I had to stop drinking. BOOKS FOR RECOVERY AND REINVENTION THE SMALL BOOK: HOW I BEAT ALCOHOLISM AND WHY ALCOHOLICS ANONYMOUS DOESN'T WORK. THE SHEPHERD AND THE RUNNINGWOLF: A PATH TO FORGIVENESS ON THE PACIFIC CREST TRAIL REINVENTION OF SELF: HOW TO CHANGE YOUR LIFE AND BEING FOREVER To listen to the deconstruction of former AA members who escaped the cult and others who don't adhere to the rooms check out their channels below: Quackoholics Anonymous https://www.youtube.com/@UCcj54GbpaeqNzy4s-nQRt4g Kirsten--Sobriety Bestie https://www.youtube.com/@UCWefB6bk8reofI7ZnXfPTNA Sober Strong https://www.youtube.com/@Soberstrong

episodes.title: AA Is A High Control Group? The Secret Dark Side Of AA Cult. What Defines AA As A Cult?
episodes.description: Are there signs that AA is controlling more than you realize? Is AA a high control group, which is a cult? The fact is, AA is control. The image of a cult. BOOKS FOR RECOVERY AND REINVENTION THE SMALL BOOK: HOW I BEAT ALCOHOLISM AND WHY ALCOHOLICS ANONYMOUS DOESN'T WORK. THE SHEPHERD AND THE RUNNINGWOLF: A PATH TO FORGIVENESS ON THE PACIFIC CREST TRAIL REINVENTION OF SELF: HOW TO CHANGE YOUR LIFE AND BEING FOREVER To listen to the deconstruction of two long time AA members who escaped the cult check out their channels below Quackoholics Anonymous https://www.youtube.com/@UCcj54GbpaeqNzy4s-nQRt4g Kirsten--Sobriety Bestie https://www.youtube.com/@UCWefB6bk8reofI7ZnXfPTNA The term John Barleycorn: taken from Jack London's work John Barleycorn, 1913
